name: CSSCGC - 2*65534-in-1 Games BASIC
description:
CSSCGC 2023 entry

ZX "2*65534 In 1 Games"  instructions

-------------------------------

Introduction ------------

Thank you for buying Many-In-1 Games. The International release title is "2*65534 In 1 Games".

Firelord Quality Games - Game Development Ideas Department.

Our staff proudly stole code from 10liner contest and adapted it to create the "Ultimate Gaming Experience" for all spectrum owners or fans!

Do you feel lucky? Try to select a random game!!!

Introduction 2 --------------

 You have all played 10in1 games, 100in1 ,200in1,256in1 ,500in1 games and many under-1000-in1 games.

Have you ever played 65534in1 game? No? We are happy to inform you that you will be able to play 2*65534in1 game!!!

Story -----

Type A games: You control a hero and must avoid the obstacles!

Type B games: You control a spaceship and must destroy enemy defences with your bouncing bomb weapon!

Instructions ------------

First select game type then select game number!

Instructions for Type A games: You control a hero and must avoid the obstacles!

Instructions for Type B games: You control a spaceship and must destroy enemy defences with your bouncing bomb weapon!

Controls --------

Game features many control options:

1. Voice Command - Need the 2GB ZX Spectrum memory expansion and the new Intel-based Z80 CPU.

2. Mind control - Has been disabled because it was discovered that the control commands were going both ways.

3. Joy-Stick. This is a prehistoric tool. It is a long stick that allows you to push keys from a distance.

If none of these work you can usekeys "1" or "o" for left and "0" or "p" for right !

Features --------
  • -Unlimited FUN!!!
  • -Many unique games
  • -It contains a practically unlimited number of addictive games with original graphics NEVER seen before in any other games!
  • -Simple and addictive games!
  • -Games that are fun to play!
  • -Fun games that you can play!
  • -You don't need to read huge manuals to play them!
  • -You can play a new game each day for the rest of your life and you can pass the game to you r grandchildren and they can continue playing one game each day!
Systems Supported -----------------
  • ZX Spectrum 
  • ZX Spectrum +
  • ZX Spectrum Clones
  • ZX Spectrum Compatible
TIPS ----
  • -You can send tips in the Main building of"Firelord Quality Games"
  • -Game Gurus suggest to note the game numbers you like so you can enjoy them again!
Credits -------

-Created by Firelord Quality Games

===========================

Official Game Review (taken from CSSCGC 2023 site)

========

Dev logs

In this game I used the "Gakactic conquest 2022" design model :This game was made very quickly in less than a day.

The idea behind it was to create a "ManyInOne" type of game that is uses randomness -in a predictable way- to generate all the games. The base games are two very simple 10liners contest entries (created by Matt B). Their DATA lines were replaced by RND entries. RANDOMIZE is used to be able to re-generate the same graphics eash time.
